avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has melted in the lowlands and settled in mountains, and is considered rather stable. Continued mild weather and rain, but wet loose avalanches or small sluffs cannot be ruled out.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow has melted in the lowlands and settled in mountains, and is considered rather stable. Continued mild weather and rain, but wet loose avalanches or small sluffs cannot be ruled out.

travelAdvisory.comment: Some new snow in highest mountains, but it has rained in the lowlands. Ongoing snowfall on the night before Thursday and decreasing shower of snow in Friday. Less snow in the south than in the north. Thin windslabs can be expected on old firn. Wind slab likely in all aspects due to variable wind directions in the last few days.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Some new snow in highest mountains, but it has rained in the lowlands. Ongoing snowfall on the night before Thursday and decreasing shower of snow in Friday. Less snow in the south than in the north.

weatherForecast.highlights: Gengur í SA átt með rigningu og hlýnandi veðri.

avalancheActivity.comment: Wet slab in Naustahvilft 19th of March.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Strong NE wind and snow the next days. The formation of unstable wind slabs can be expected on south to west-facing aspects.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow is forecasted in strong NE wind on Wednesday and Thursday. Wind slabs are likely to form and may be unstable. A small amount of snow fell in the mountains on Monday in easterly winds. The older snowpack is generally considered stable.

travelAdvisory.comment: Some new snow in highest mountains, but it has rained in the lowlands. Ongoing snowfall on the night before Thursday and decreasing shower of snow in Friday. Less snow in the south than in the north. Thin windslabs can be expected on old firn. Wind slab likely in all aspects due to variable wind directions in the last few days.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Some new snow in highest mountains, but it has rained in the lowlands. Ongoing snowfall on the night before Thursday and decreasing shower of snow in Friday. Less snow in the south than in the north.

weatherForecast.highlights: Norðaustan 10-23 m/s og snjókoma á miðvikudag og fimmtudag. Hiti við frostmark. Dregur úr seint á fimmtudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Some new snow is in the area in high mountains and small slabs could be present at high elevations. Snow has settled in recent days, but older wind slabs might remain at higher elevations. Snowfall on Wednesday and Thursday in N wind.

snowpackStructure.highlights: The old snow is considered mostly stable. Some old wind slabs could be present in gullies and depressions at higher elevations. Some new snow added on Monday with thin windslabs possible in N-E facing slopes. New snow expected on Wednesday and Thursday and windslab forming in S to W aspects.

travelAdvisory.comment: Some new snow in highest mountains, but it has rained in the lowlands. Ongoing snowfall on the night before Thursday and decreasing shower of snow in Friday. Less snow in the south than in the north. Thin windslabs can be expected on old firn. Wind slab likely in all aspects due to variable wind directions in the last few days.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Some new snow in highest mountains, but it has rained in the lowlands. Ongoing snowfall on the night before Thursday and decreasing shower of snow in Friday. Less snow in the south than in the north.

weatherForecast.highlights: Snýr í A/NA átt á miðvikudag og fimmtudag og snjókoma til fjalla en stöku él á fimmtudags kvöld og fram á föstudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Little or no snow at low elevations and hard packed snow in the mountains with a thin cover of new snow. Softer snow is present in ravines and depressions.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Little or no snow is at low elevations and hard packed snow is in the mountains with a thin cover of new snow. Snow is considered mostly stable. The new snow could drift to southeasterly aspects.

travelAdvisory.comment: Some new snow in highest mountains, but it has rained in the lowlands. Ongoing snowfall on the night before Thursday and decreasing shower of snow in Friday. Less snow in the south than in the north. Thin windslabs can be expected on old firn. Wind slab likely in all aspects due to variable wind directions in the last few days.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Some new snow in highest mountains, but it has rained in the lowlands. Ongoing snowfall on the night before Thursday and decreasing shower of snow in Friday. Less snow in the south than in the north.

weatherForecast.highlights: Snýr í A/NA átt á mið/fim með snjókomu til fjalla fyrst um sinn en svo éljum.
